St._Paul.Macalester College: Macalester College () is a private, coeducational liberal arts college located in Saint Paul, Minnesota, United States. Founded in 1874, Macalester is exclusively an undergraduate four-year institution and enrolled 2,146 students in the fall of 2017 from 50 U.S. states and 93 countries. It is currently a Forbes Top 100 College, and a Forbes Top 50 School for International Students.
